name: Dots (itch) (Michael Quartermain)
description:
This is the first game I ever made, it took me over 4 weeks. I hope you enjoy and donate I hope to get enough to release on Steam. This game requires a monitor or screen with at least 1920 across and 1080 up. Very basic game BTW.

The controls are the arrow keys to move and R to restart.

You are a white dot trying to get the highest score possible, you lose if you touch a red dot and you gain score over time and through collecting the yellow coins. The rainbow dot gives you invincibility for a short time. Achieve your best beat you friends and most importantly have fun. 

This is my first game so please donate.
